title: Blasphemy
description: Deep in an Arizona mountain, the world's largest supercollider is poised to probe the Big Bang itself. Some people think this experiment will unlock the mysteries of the universe. Some think it will create a mini black hole that will destroy earth. Others think that Gregory North Hazelius and his fellow scientists are Satan incarnate--out to obliterate Genesis and dethrone God.When the supercollider is turned on, Hazelius and his team discover a secret so devastating they must conceal it at all costs. But such secrets are hard to keep, and the U.S. government tasks Wyman Ford, ex-monk and CIA operative, with uncovering it.The countdown begins...
author: Douglas Preston
